trends: There have been no other sightings in Hilliards
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsMy girlfriend and i were about to pull into our driveway when i noticed this large black boomerang object fllying just over the tree tops with no sound.i imediatley turned the car around and started following it,we drove about 4 to. 5 miles before we lost it over the hills we i couldnt drive anymore.i was so excited cause in my mind i was pretty sure it was a ufo but never said anything because i knew nobody would believe me but im sayin it now cause i would like to know if there were any other sightings around this time cause i would like to know i wasnt hallucinating this for some re ason
Summary: flying object over my mobil home
